Blog.post: LoLx, Today woke up very late then at 1st thought kai coming but too bad dun think he coming, so nothing to do then sian... Then meet hang in gunbound, ask him wanna go out bo he say go out also must find somewhere no need spend money 1, so i sian le.... So after much "nth to do" at home, decided go out lo.... Then went Upper seletar Reservoir to enjoy breeze thn go stroll, ask hang wan go bo he say dunno how to go so i go myself lo, sian... LoLx, then spend abt an hour or so there lo, i at a tower at the reservoir mah, like 4 to 5 storey high so can enjoy breeze, lolx, stay there for an hour like tt then went home le... On the way home got pass by golf resort ma,m then saw 1 golf ball on tt road so took it home, muahahaha... Then at home nth to do play com all day le lo... Then see 7 pm show so shiok! So again V.sian.... (SIANSIANSIAN, BORING AT HOME NTH TO DO!)

sIA lA, Today still same.. go sch and study.... thn nth much happen also... Then after sch kana bully by vivian ask me help her go photocopy 1 page in the A math TextbK, haiz, cannot blame, im too kind ^^, thn after tt we went to tt badminton court for soccer "tornament" bahz, thn b4 game start hang saw kishen thn ride bicycle wif me go find ****** thn met her in the return way, lolz, hang hot le! Haha... then i got in a team wif yu fei, rui ring and adil, at 1st thought will not win la, but thn we nvr lost a game lolz, damm tyco sia, then me score 7 goalz , haha, again, tyco, lolz.... Thn winnerz got 2 bottle 1.5 L bottle drinkz , haha, thn hang they all came in 2nd in place coz hang hot b4 tt match , ha! n they got 1 bottle of 1.5 L, thn Sebastian pro sia, got the top scorer (dunno 10 or 11 goalz lo) Then Hidir got best play bahz. After tt we went home le, sooo late le... Then suddenly hang sms me say wallet gone, ask me whether gt take bo... haiz... lost his Ezlink card, 8 dollarz and some "precious" photosnapz ba, Thn tt's all for today le lo : ) (Finally Life's a bit intersting today ^^)

LoLzZzZz... today as usual wake up go sch, thn sianz lo , PE did something damm foolish... dun even wanna participate..... After tt lesson... then when return frm history.. my table kana vandalish by ******.... Then sian... bo mood to clear it.... After tt recess nv go thn at least ****** got liang xin treat me n hang biscuit, thn after tt chem test i anyhow ti kam ti kam all the question.. not even 1 Q i know how to do... coz chem lesson damm boring nv really go n concentrate on what tt teacher teach..... After sch went for math... thn for a while nia we can go liao coz we smart ma ^^ Thn we went home lo, nth much again happen today, life's as boring as usual.... (LIFE'S BORING BORING... SIAN SIAN SIAN)

...Sian today, Vivian keep tell me lotz of her da dao li... thn hang also say say say tel tell telll... Bo liao sia... they lyk stead so much go stead la, mai drag me in can le.... told them dun lyk liao they still come make me.... Haiz... what's more she go take my card give mad... siao ar? if u r reading me blog as i know u will , plz le, i know what to do la, rao le wo ba... After sch actually going for soccer, but thn no 1 going so nv go... life already very sian liao, they go make my life until more sian....... If i lyk her i will go tell her 1 so ppl, plz dun worry 4 me hor......... tt's abt all 4 todae ^^ (LIFE'S DAMM DAMM DAMM BORING!!!!!SIAN SIAN SIAN SIAN!!!!)

Today got back MT paper, lolx, got 78, but too bad teacher mark wrong, then im honest mah, so go edit the marks, haiz, kana deduct 6 marks but still A ^^, then today hang keep ask me who my new target lo... thn i sian.... think dun hav target liao ba, haiz, dunno whether continue love her or what, so no target lo,thn kana li xiao by meihong today, kaoz.. sian.... then today keep "concern" abt vivian tt guy thingy, haha she shld have give her phone number n see what kind of nonesence they would send ma, thn today after sch went 309 wait for shimin, hang wanna lend her ten yrs series, tt hang ar, keep finding excuse to go 309, lolx, ThE PoWeR Of ****, ha! (shh, dun tell him i wrote this)Ha! Then we went central walk walk thn went home for tuition (sian!)tt's abt all for today! also quite sian la (Life's BORING, SIAN SIAN SIAN!)

Sian.. need go school liao, haven done any hw except summary...Nth much happen today lo, juz dunno what chem teacher talking and eng teacher keep aim on me... at least i know to fight back ^^ Then after sch i n hang went to eat lnch and shun bian wait for shi min return her cal. Then we went bball... thN i went hang hse take games, but sian.. his bro lend out liao...Nth to do so went home.. Life's as boring as usual... Nth much happen todae... (Life's Boring, Sian!!!)

Life's normal as usual... wake up.. eat breakfast n proceed to school.Then Sian... Hao And Hang still haven He Hao....So wat can i do? be stuck in between them lo.... Haiz.... Life's sian........Nth much happen in school, after sch, we went bball then soccer thn home! Then also nothing much happen... Sian day... Bo liao day... (Life's SUPER BORING, SIANZ!

Hmm, today is not so boring 4 me ^^ (went out wif kai and hang watch i robot), then we went X zone play, thn saw many FrEnz we know, i play till i no money lolz! after that thn we went home... then now thinking for tomorrow~~~Hmm... dunno what i shld do tomorrow.... Homework not done... Never study for test....and tomorrow after school also dunno who to pei... pei hang hao will say i pang seh... pei hao hang will say i pang seh... haiz.. headache......... hMM.. BETTER GO STICK WITH KAI ba...... That's all for today, nothing more to blog.... Afterall, today can also be considered boring la..... (Life's boring, Sian!)

Nothing much happened today.. haiz.. stayed at home for the whole day.. thought of going out to sembawang shop to play 1, sms kai and he told me he juz come back frm there... so bo liao lo... then my com that can use the msn 1 repaired and come back le, but kana the 1 min virus... then sms hang to ask him send me the removal tool, but then he say he outside... haiz... go out also nv date me go.. then he say he with madeline dating dun 1 me be gooseberry.. so i reply oic, nvm lo, come home thn call me... so i waited all the way then he go home... but then he say maybe bro deleted the removal tool, so i sian le.... nothing to play, no msn to chat.. boring... haiz, dunno how am i supposed to get pass tomorrow sitting at home to fa mei..... BORING! Sian... Now left only sms le.. but then also cannot find any1 to chat... sian............. (Life's DAMM BORING, SUPER SIAN!!!)

Today wake up very early!!! Cause must reached school at 10am... today is NDP wat... we reached the stadium quite early and have lunch... Then at 1st thought vivian sick not coming... then saw her face pale pale sitting in front of me, then dun dare talk to her lo, her fever haven recover bahz... Then ....... (something happened) then i sian le... haiz... wait n wait n wait, finally our dinner... After dinner thn abt 6 pm we changed n get rdy to go stadium ! Actually today shld be happy... but something happen make me sian.... After our show, got the POST PARADE PARTY! SO SHIOK! At 1st i sian, duynno where to go, thn anyhow walk saw "VJC", thn want liao tian 1 but i think she too sick to liao tian.. so walk away and saw hang n gang, so went to join in! Thn we had fun and took photographs and play around!! The phototgraph part they push me and "her" together... haiz... so maybe tt part not so sian, but thn we also nv chat much nowadays... After the party we went back indoor and after tt home sweete home!!!! (Life's sometimes boring and sometimes not, and life's sometimes sian, sometimes NOT!!)

Today wake up super late!!!! dunno why... 1st time wake up at 11.30 am!!! Hmm, then i go put music and pictures in my blog, nice??? although haven complete all yet, still need make the cursor!! Oh ya, and i went out with family cause today i dun hav any dates :( ... we went eating then went to book place to watch the fireworks near the esplanade!!! Today the fireworks is much nicer than last week!!! Pity never bring digital camera!! or i put the picture in my blog liao!! Nvm, still got tomorrow, Ndp also got fireworks!! After that i went home straight and then thought of chatting wif frenz by sms, then come to think of it also no ppl wan to chat with me 1.... So sian lo...blame who le? blame my ren yuan bu hao... Haiz... (Life's boring!! Sian!!!)

Today wake up damm late... then know that vivian sick with fever(so poor thing), after that i went X zone to meet up with Sikai, Chin Chieh, Soon Song, Madeline, Shi Min, Shu Ning and Joan. Lolz, and kai forget buy present, so we accomapany him go buy, buy a small gift for the BD boy,after that went his house then we go down buy drinks and tibits to go hang house eat, then went plan to go vivian house visit her and treat her her own cake she bought, but unlucky lo, the cake kana drop a few times b4 reaching her house, haiz, then we knock knock knock, thought no1 inside... then suddenly some1 discover door not locked!! lolx, then know that she inside but maybe too sick to come out open the gate??? Sian, we wait till so long.. come all the way to visit, but nvm, juz hope her a speedy recovery! Then almost all go home liaoz... then actually want accompany Madeline to her bus stop wait bus 1, then they all pang seh me ask me go with her.. but in the end i nv go lo, but when we go x zone to play saw her waiting at bus stop, so stop to say goodbye, haiz, wan to pei her wait bus 1 then they all want go X zone play, so i no choice, can't possibly leave me there wait with her, later no topic talk veri sian... and later they all li xiao me and get the wrong idea.. so better not... after that went home, eat dinner le.. tt's all for today, (life's boring, sian)
